How to Read this ManualÂ¶

The manuals for this product are all structured in the same way.

To receive the best possible support when using the product, please observe the following information:

If you are not familiar with how the product functions, please read the CONTACT Elements: Client Reference manual first. This manual describes the basic functions and explains how to work with this product.

This manual builds on the knowledge contained in the CONTACT Elements: Client Reference manual.

Note

This user manual describes a standard installation. Your administrator can custom-configure the standard settings. Therefore, please contact your administrator for questions about installation-specific representations and configurations for your system.
